definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

sentences.english: It's the first time I had ever  overdrawn  my account.
sentences.chinese: 那是我第一次透支我的賬戶。

sentences.english: It carries over no balance. It allows no overdraft.
sentences.chinese: 它沒有設置餘額，也不允許透支。

sentences.english: A business overdraft would be most suitable for short-term loans.
sentences.chinese: 商業透支項目最適合短期貸款。

sentences.english: industry go overdrawn overnight does no good. The market needs to grow in a healthy way.
sentences.chinese: 讓一個行業通宵透支沒有好處，市場需要健康地成長。

sentences.english: Drawing what is furthest away first and overdrawing things that are nearer.
sentences.chinese: 圖紙是什麼接近第一和透支你最遠的東西。

sentences.english: Debit cards do not possess the overdrawing function.
sentences.chinese: 借記卡不具備透支功能。

sentences.english: Otherwise, you may incur fees for overdrafts or returned checks.
sentences.chinese: 否則，可能會招致透支或退票費。

sentences.english: Does at present our country overdraw what card is the credit card with highest forehead?
sentences.chinese: 目前我國透支額最高的信用卡是什麼卡？

sentences.english: How much can I overdraw from my personal ordinary card?
sentences.chinese: 我的這張個人普通卡可以透支多少呢？

sentences.english: We honored the check the overdraft was only 5 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 我們承兌這張支票的透支額唯有5元。

sentences.english: Insufficient funds will easily cause to overdrawn.
sentences.chinese: 存款不足很容易導致透支。

sentences.english: Rest well. Don't overdraw on your physical strength.
sentences.chinese: 充分的休息，別透支你的體力。

sentences.english: I have a credit card, but I never overdraft.
sentences.chinese: 我有信用卡，但是我從來都不用透支的。

sentences.english: We honored the check considering overdraft was only 5 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 我們承兌這張支票的透支額惟有5元。

sentences.english: However , such maximum sum for credit cards that permit overdraft will not be raised.
sentences.chinese: 不過，對於允許透支的貸記卡，原定的上限不變。

sentences.english: We honored the check as the overdraft am only 5 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 咱們承兌這張支票的透支額只有5元。

definition: to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
to collapse/to be worn out/to break down
to hollow out/to empty out/to use up/(finance) tunneling
